name: Car Wash Tycoon
description:
Car Wash Tycoon, by Atrocity Games

Welcome to the official ITCH.io Car Wash page. If you've made it this far, you're probably wondering why you still haven't turned around. 

Purpose of Development;

This game is being developed in the soul purpose of my love for Car Washes and all their glory. At the current state of development, there isn't much of it. Some features including, broken game scripts, terrible UI, and a lot of waiting.
